name: Carson Valley Inn & Casino
description: Situated at the foot of the Sierra Nevada Mountains in Minden, Nevada, Carson Valley Inn is a full-service casino resort just 20 minutes from Lake Tahoe. The property features 149 hotel rooms including 11 suites, a 74-room motor lodge, and a 59-site RV park. With 600 slot machines, eight table games, a sports book, three dining options, live entertainment in the Cabaret Lounge, and the outdoor TJ's Corral concert venue, CVI delivers authentic Nevada hospitality with no resort fees.
shortDescription: Welcoming inn in Minden with casino, dining, and easy access to Carson Valley golf courses.
highlights: Minutes from Genoa Lakes Golf Club

faqs.question: Does Carson Valley Inn charge a resort fee?
faqs.answer: No — Carson Valley Inn never charges resort fees. Free parking (valet and self-parking) is included for all guests.

faqs.question: How far is Carson Valley Inn from Lake Tahoe?
faqs.answer: Lake Tahoe's south shore is about 20 minutes west via Highway 88. The Reno-Tahoe International Airport is approximately 45 minutes north.

faqs.question: What golf courses are near Carson Valley Inn?
faqs.answer: Carson Valley is surrounded by excellent courses including Genoa Lakes, Dayton Valley, Eagle Valley, and Toiyabe. Golf the High Sierra builds custom packages with CVI lodging — call 888-584-8232.
